name: Linkwarden
short_description: Self-hosted bookmark manager with full-text search, archiving, and collaboration features.
description: Linkwarden is a self-hosted, open-source bookmark manager designed to preserve links and archive web pages. It allows you to save, organize, and search through your bookmarks with full-text search capabilities. Features include link previews, automatic screenshot capture, archival of web page content, collaborative collections for teams, tagging and folders for organization, import/export functionality, and a clean modern interface. Perfect for curating research, saving important articles, or managing shared bookmarks with family or team.
usecases: Save and organize bookmarks with automatic archiving of web page content.
Search through saved links and archived content instantly.
Share bookmark collections with family or team members.
Preserve important web resources that might disappear from the internet.
notes: Web pages are archived for offline access
Supports multiple users and shared collections
